Name: Fifty.ServerMessages [FSM]
Description:
Part of FSU [ Fifty Server Utilities ]
Implements server side messages and player score tracking

Dependencies:
  - Northstar
  - Fifty.ServerUtilities
  - Fifty.ServerChatCommands

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_0
ConVars.DefaultValue: You can use the %H%Pnextmap <map>%T command to vote for the next map!

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_1
ConVars.DefaultValue: You can use the %H%Pskip%T command to vote to skip the map!

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_2
ConVars.DefaultValue: Run %H%Pextend%T to vote to extend teh match.

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_3
ConVars.DefaultValue: Run %H%Phelp <command>%T to get a detailed description of what it does.

ConVars.Name: FSM_BROADCAST_4
ConVars.DefaultValue: Run %H%Pmaps <page>%T to get a list of maps in the voting pool.
